name: The Wonderful World of Mickey Mouse
summary: The Wonderful World of Mickey Mouse is an American animated web television series produced by Disney Television Animation for Disney+. The series is a continuation and revival of the Emmy Award-winning Mickey Mouse TV series, uses the same style, and has many of the same cast and crew, with the exception of the late Russi Taylor as Minnie Mouse, who is replaced by Kaitlyn Robrock. The series was first announced on September 14, 2020, and premiered on November 18, 2020, to coincide with Mickey's 92nd birthday.
info:
• 中文名: 米老鼠的奇妙世界
  • 话数: 未知
  • 放送开始: 2020-11-18
  • 官方网站: https://mickey.disney.com/mickey-cartoons
  • 播放电视台: Disney+

eps.name: Cheese Wranglers
eps.desc: Minnie Mouse, the proprietor of Big Thunder Valley, hires Mickey Mouse, the best cheese wrangler in the west, to ride every cheese wheel to town, with her ranch hands, Donald Duck and Goofy assisting him. But they need to keep the cheese safe from infamous cheese rustler, Peg-Leg Pete.

eps.name: House of Tomorrow
eps.desc: At the Hall of Science, Mickey, Donald, and Goofy sneak in to Professor Ludwig von Drake's House of Tomorrow, a futuristic house with an artificial intelligence tending to their every need, which turns out to not be the dream they were envisioning.

eps.name: Hard to Swallow
eps.desc: Mickey tries to get Pluto to eat his flea pill, which Pluto finds disgusting. The situation becomes dire when an army of fleas target Pluto.

eps.name: School of Fish
eps.desc: Mickey sends his goldfish, Gubbles, to school, but becomes so concerned for his well-being that he begins following him around everywhere at school.

eps.name: Keep on Rollin
eps.desc: Mickey and his friends' disco night at the roller rink is crashed by Peg-Leg Pete and his gang of Disney villains.

eps.name: The Big Good Wolf
eps.desc: Mickey tries to reform the Big Bad Wolf, only to find out it’s not very easy.

eps.name: The Brave Little Squire
eps.desc: Mickey dreams of being a knight but discovers his new boss' heroic reputation is a fairytale.

eps.name: An Ordinary Date
eps.desc: Mickey and Minnie try to make their date an original and excitable one.

eps.name: Supermarket Scramble
eps.desc: Mickey and friends decide to have a barbecue.

eps.name: Just the Four of Us
eps.desc: Donald and Daisy try to avoid having a double date with Mickey and Minnie.
